start.message:
Welcome to Jatro BPO Accounts Support Portal.

Please select the client account you are transacting with:

neighbourly_menu.message:
Welcome to the Neighbourly Strata Management Invoice Processing Assistant.
Please select your concern:

neigh_1.message:
Steps to process:
  • Step 1 – Verify Invoice: Supplier name matches system, ABN (if applicable), Invoice number & date, Correct property / client code, GST breakdown, Total amount.
  • Step 2 – Check Supporting Documents: Approved work order or quote, Contract reference, Email approval.
  • Step 3 – Encode in Accounting System: Enter supplier info, invoice number, dates, amounts, and property allocation, Check for duplicates.
  • Step 4 – Attach Documents: Invoice PDF + approval email + supporting docs, Filename format: PropertyCode_Supplier_InvoiceNumber_Date.
  • Step 5 – Submit for Approval: Route to Strata Manager, Status: Pending Approval.

neigh_2.message:
Invoice must include:
  • Supplier legal name
  • ABN (AU suppliers)
  • Invoice number & date
  • Description of service
  • GST (if applicable)
  • Total amount
  • Bank details (first-time supplier)

Missing info? → Request correction before processing.

neigh_3.message:
Approval Workflow:
  1. Jatro BPO encodes invoice
  2. Submit to Strata Manager
  3. Manager approves
  4. Forward to Finance for payment

Rejected? → Correct and resubmit.

neigh_4.message:
Payment Processing:
  • Confirm due date
  • Verify bank details
  • Add to payment batch
  • Mark 'Scheduled for Payment'
  • After payment, mark 'Paid' and attach proof
  • Notify manager

neigh_5.message:
Common Errors:
  • Duplicate invoice number
  • Wrong property code
  • Incorrect GST
  • Missing approval
  • Expired contract
  • Bank details mismatch

Check before submission.

neigh_6.message:
Urgent or Disputed Invoice:
  • URGENT → Mark, notify manager, get approval
  • DISPUTED → Flag, inform manager, wait for clarification

neigh_7.message:
Escalation Levels:
  • Level 1: Team Leader
  • Level 2: Accounts Senior Team Leader
  • Level 3: Strata Manager

jt_menu.message:
Welcome to the J&T Partners Invoice Processing Assistant.
Please select your concern:

jt_1.message:
Steps to process:
  • Step 1 – Verify Invoice: Supplier matches system records, Invoice number & date, GST breakdown, Total amount.
  • Step 2 – Supporting Documents: Work order / approved quote, Contract reference, Email approval.
  • Step 3 – Encode in Accounting System: Enter supplier, invoice number, dates, amounts, expense account, client allocation. Check for duplicates.
  • Step 4 – Attach Documents: Invoice + approval email + supporting docs. Filename: ClientCode_Supplier_InvoiceNumber_Date
  • Step 5 – Submit for Approval: Route to assigned accountant. Status: Pending Approval

jt_2.message:
Invoice must include:
  • Supplier legal name
  • ABN (if AU supplier)
  • Invoice number & date
  • Service description
  • GST if applicable
  • Total payable amount
  • Bank details (if first-time supplier)

Incomplete? → Request correction.

jt_3.message:
Approval Workflow:
  1. Jatro BPO encodes invoice
  2. Submit to assigned accountant
  3. Accountant reviews & approves
  4. Payment scheduling

Rejected? → Correct & resubmit.

jt_4.message:
Payment Processing:
  • Verify due date & bank details
  • Include in payment batch
  • Status → Scheduled for Payment
  • Mark Paid & attach proof
  • Notify relevant accountant

jt_5.message:
Common Errors:
  • Duplicate invoice
  • Wrong client allocation
  • GST calculation errors
  • Missing approval
  • Expired contract
  • Bank details mismatch

jt_6.message:
Urgent or Disputed Invoice:
  • URGENT → Mark, notify accountant, confirm approval
  • DISPUTED → Flag, inform accountant, await clarification

jt_7.message:
Escalation Levels:
  • Level 1: Assigned Accountant
  • Level 2: Team Leader
  • Level 3: Senior Accounts Team Leader

done.message: Thank you for using Jatro BPO Support Portal! Have a great day.
